Čezmejno zasledovanje se je pri Bazovici končalo s trčenjem
02 Nov 2019, 16:31 by Spletno uredništvo

Okrog 13.30 se je pri Bazovici s prometno nesrečo zaključilo čezmejno zasledovanje, pri čemer sta bili dve osebi poškodovani, poroča Primorski dnevnik.



Pri Bazovici je bmw trčil v zid bližnje hiše in še v audi A3, v katerem so se peljali turisti iz Genove. Foto: FOTODAMJ@N

BAZOVICA > Slovenski policisti so med Kozino in Bazovico zasledovali bmw nemške registracije, ki ga je vozil iraški državljan. Z njim so bili v avtu še nemška državljanka, otrok in odrasla moška, katerih državljanstvo še ni znano.
Slovensko policijsko vozilo brez oznak je bmw zasledovalo iz smeri Peska in ga naposled blokiralo pri Bazovici med odcepom za šoht in križiščem s cesto, ki pelje proti Trstu. Bmw je trčil v zid bližnje hiše in še v audi A3, v katerem so se peljali turisti iz Genove. V trku sta se dva potnika bmw-ja poškodovala in so ju prepeljali v bolnišnico, medtem ko je voznik skušal zbežati v smeri proti šohtu, vendar so ga kmalu prijeli.
Ženska je skušala odvreči mobilni telefon, ki je končal na vrtu bližnje hiše, kjer so ga tudi našli. Tri osebe so bile lažje poškodovane in so jih reševalci prepeljali v katinarsko bolnišnico. Na prizorišče so prišli pripadniki italijanske državne policije, karabinjerjev in vojske, poleg tega še slovenski policisti in dva rešilca službe 118. Državno scesto so zaradi dogodka zaprli za promet.

The cross-border pursuit ended in a collision with Bazovica
02 Nov 2019, 16:31 by Web Editing

At about 1.30pm, a cross-border pursuit ended in a car accident in Bazovica, with two people injured, Primorski daily reports.



At Bazovica, the bmw crashed into a wall of a nearby house and another into an Audi A3, in which tourists from Genoa drove. Photo: FOTODAMJ @ N

BAZOVICA> Slovenian police officers were pursuing a German registration car driven by an Iraqi citizen between Kozina and Bazovica. He was in the car with a German national, a child and an adult male whose nationality is unknown.
The unmarked Slovenian police vehicle pursued the bmw from the direction of Sand and eventually blocked it at Bazovica between the mine turn and the intersection with the road leading to Trieste. The Bmw collided with a wall of a nearby house and another Audi A3, in which tourists from Genoa drove. Two bmw passengers were injured in the collision and were taken to hospital while the driver tried to flee towards the manhole, but was soon apprehended.
The woman tried to dispose of a cellphone that ended up in the garden of a nearby house, where he was also found. Three people were slightly injured and were taken to a hospital by a paramedic. Members of the Italian state police, carabinieri and army arrived on the scene, as well as Slovenian police officers and two ambulance service 118. The national road was closed for traffic due to the incident.
